column4: Blah, when I upgraded to Gaim 1.1.2, it stopped connecting to MSN
I asked on #gaim and they couldn't help me either
go back to the older version
/var/cache/apt i'd say... locating and install an old versoin
Where are the packages that the installation CD installs?
Windows is a damned good thing to emulate in a quite a few places
sure, but don't say you're windows until you are :)
things won't just work until vendors properly support linux
until them (some) linux users live in a second rate world
Yeah. There's a reason I'm considering moving back to Windows already.
I've been running Ubuntu for a week now.
That's generally because manufacturers provide drivers to Windows and not Linux.
it's because linux is the minority
not that it's ubuntu's fault or anything
